sn45.24:1.2: “Mendicants, I don’t praise wrong practice for laypeople or renunciates.
sn45.24:1.3: Because of wrong practice, neither laypeople nor renunciates succeed in the procedure of the skillful teaching.
sn45.24:2.2: It is wrong view, wrong thought, wrong speech, wrong action, wrong livelihood, wrong effort, wrong mindfulness, and wrong immersion.
sn45.24:2.3: This is called the wrong practice.
sn45.24:2.4: I don’t praise wrong practice for lay people or renunciates.
sn45.24:2.5: Because of wrong practice, neither laypeople nor renunciates succeed in the procedure of the skillful teaching.
sn45.24:3.1: I praise right practice for laypeople and renunciates.
sn45.24:3.2: Because of right practice, both laypeople and renunciates succeed in the procedure of the skillful teaching.
sn45.24:3.4: It is right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion.
sn45.24:3.5: This is called the right practice.
sn45.24:3.6: I praise right practice for laypeople and renunciates.
sn45.24:3.7: Because of right practice, both laypeople and renunciates succeed in the procedure of the skillful teaching.”
